version_description:
# New iOS 7 Design

# iCloud Support

# New Clouds (Upload and Download)
- Dropbox
- Google Drive
- OneDrive
- Evernote
- Box.net
- SugarSync
- WebDav Server
- FTP Server

# PDF to Image Export - Now export PDF pa

[+] Send Fax - Now you can fax Image or PDF file from PDF Export
[+] Cloud Shortcut - Create cloud folder shortcut to quick upload and download files
[+] Cloud Upload Enhancements - Background upload issue resolved
[+] File Informations - View ad

*** One of the biggest updates ever ***

■ Online Document to PDF Converter.
• More format support than offline converter.
- Office Document to PDF (Word, Excel, PPT)
- Open Office Document to PDF
- Lotus Document to

- File list shows file thumbnails now
- PDF Scanner major improvements
- Extensions enhancements
- Many more UI and feature enhancements.

-iOS 9 bug fixes.
-PDF to Images Improvement.
-PDF Merger Improvement.
-Easily Import Images.
-Major bug fixes and improvements.

Thanks to everyone for your support. This update brings new features.

+ Add watermark to PDF (Text watermark or Image watermark).
+ Add Page number to PDF.
+ Rotate PDF.
+ Edit PDF (Add pages into PDF file, Re-arrange PDF pages).
+ Unlo

Thanks to everyone for your support. This update brings new features.

+ Bug fixes.
+ Add watermark to PDF (Text watermark or Image watermark).
+ Add Page number to PDF.
+ Rotate PDF.
+ Edit PDF (Add pages into PDF file, Re-arrange PDF p

感谢大家的支持。 此更新带来了新的功能和改进。

+带自动边框检测和过滤图像的新文档扫描仪。
+ iCloud增强功能。 现在您可以从iCloud Drive访问PDF导出iCloud文件。
+错误修复和改进。
+ UI增强
+与iOS 10兼容。

+可在11种不同的语言
英语，Español，Français，Deutsch，Português（Br。），Português，Italiano，中文（简体），Русский，日本语，한국어
